transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Sir please sir cut aayidchi phone.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Sir kekuthungala pesurathu? 
Executive: Aa kekuthu kekuthu sir sorry sir cut aayidchi athu signal illama cut aayirunthuchi sollunga.
Customer: Ippo naan enna sonnen sir enaku payment refund panreenga abidinnu naan mail pannen sir.
Executive: Yes okay sir.
Customer: Aah ha ha.
Executive: Ethu call neethu neethu neenga sujitha avunga kitta pesi irukinga neenga.
Customer: Enaku refund pannidunga abdingara maari pesi irukinga nu sonnanga.
Executive: Aama.
Executive: Athuku mail avunga regarding koduthu irukinga nu sonnanga and athukaga process panni irukanga sir.
Customer: Illa sir manager kitta pesu nanga nee manager kitta call pannunga abdi nanga seri manager call panna number avunga anupchi vitta number patha switch off.
Customer: Ivungalukum phone panna ivungalum phone attend pannala sir naan vanthu ippo nilla sir future la panna kuda enaku oru idea irukum indiamart la pannalam abidinnu.
Customer: Illa abidinnu batchathula sariyaana response illa na naan eppadi sir nambirathu 36250 katti suthama ukarthu irukanga sir rendu maasama enoda account details enoda statement kuda naan anuparen sir.
Executive: Hmm puriyuthu.
Customer: Enna oru customer kitta phone panni namma vanthu idhe maari order namma vangurana avanga payment anuppa matingiranga.
Customer: Suthama payment anuppa matingiranga ivanga order anupchi vututu yemaththu ponathu thaan micham.
Customer: Sir payment thaan sir refund pannunga.
Executive: Aama sir neenga athuku munnadi thaan neenga athuku neenga kettrukinga athuku avunga process panni irukanga.
Executive: Maximum vanthu pathinga one week kulla refund aagurathuku avunga enna enna initiate pannumo athu ellame panni vachirukanga.
Executive: Already aana neenga ithu vanthu last 12 months i mean two months neenga use panni irukinga ungaluku intha oru leads kuda ungaluku ithu convert aagalaingala.
Customer: Oru oru piece of positive kuda intha veliyila irukku illingala.
Customer: Sir payment advance payment poda matingiranga sir lead convert aagathu illa advance payment poda matingiranga innonu rendavathu kettinga na sample anupunga ntranga sample anupchi vuturathu.
Customer: Sample anupchi vuttom antha sample kum payment varala athuku appuram rendavathu pathinga sample enna sir achinnu sir illa sir ungala maari pathu peru pathinju peru engaluku sample anupchi irukanga naan yosichi thaan solla mudiyum abdinraanga athu achimaa maari irukku.
Customer: Innonu telangana la irunthu idhe maari sir engaluku oru lead venum engaluku idhe maari 3500 box venum abdinraanga enaku seri sir neenga GST number anupchi vidunga nu sonnanum GST number anupchi vitten na GST cancel aayirukku.
Customer: Seri sir unga 1000 box avungaluthu enna yaan sir GST cancel aaguthu.
Executive: Illa illa illa okay okay sorry.
Customer: Seri yaan sir ungaluku GST cancel aayirukku seri sir ungaluku 1000 box venumna naan anupchi vuduren sir abdinna na illa nee courier kitta poittu enaku phone pannunga naanga payment potruren abdinraanga.
Customer: Seri ellathaiyume ready pannittu courier kitta pona payment ivan enna solraana enga ooru enga state ku vantha thaan naan payment anuppuven.
Customer: En state ku anupchi vidunga abdinraanga rendavathu avungaluku phone panna phone ye edukala naan anuppa matten abdinna phone ye edukala intha maari naan product kuduthutu 30000 32000 product kuduthu naan enna sir panrathu.
Customer: Naan payment thaan sir naan refund pannunga naan kekurathu thaan mthapadi naan enna panna naan enoda bank statement kaatrana paaringa.
Customer: Phone panni phone panni idhe maari ungaluku call panrappa ungaluku vanthu idhe maari indiamart poruthu varaikum ungaluku vanthu unlimited call ungaluku unlimited enquiry ellam ungaluku nariya varum phone laiye varum message laiye varum oru call oru message varala ithu varaikum.
Executive: Naan oru oru vishayam kuda solren sir ippo ungaluku vanthu ithu ellame vanthu neenga already pesi irukinga sujitha kitta neenga ellame solli irukinga.
Executive: Athu ellame avunga mention panni irukanga.
Customer: Seri sir.
Executive: Athu abdi enna sir.
Customer: Sir naan innum neenga athu vanthu continue panrathuku ishtam illa enaku vanthu venda ithu continue panna venda nu solli neenga sonnathuku appuram thaan avunga avunga kitta irunthu mail i think vaangi irukanga nu ninaikiren mail receive panni irukanga.
Customer: Mail address anupchi vitten sir.
Executive: Aama aama mail anuppi irukanga athuku vanthu refund process panrathuku process panni taanga avunga.
Executive: Okay athu okay la neethu avunga mail unga maila vaangi avunga refund ku enna enna initiative edukkanumo athu ellame eduthachi.
Executive: Maximum one week kulla neenga evlo naal ippo two months thaan neenga usage poga balance evlo cost iruko athu ellame ungaluku refund aayidum.
Customer: Two months na athu eppadi sir approximately eppadi solreenga neenga.
Executive: Okay neenga eppo join panni irukinga indiamart la.
Customer: September 18 sir.
Executive: September 18 la.
Executive: September aama sir september 18 join panni irukinga.
Executive: Innaiku vanthu correct a vanthu 18 am thethi 18 am thethi november illaiya correct a rendu maasam aagumnu ninaikiren.
Customer: Aama november.
Executive: November athavathu september irunthu october november rendu maasam mudinjirukku intha rendu maasa cost mattum kalichittu balance varakoodiyathu ungaluku vanthu amount a vanthu refund aagurathuku process panraanga.
Customer: Refund 36250 receive aagum.
Executive: Illa sir 36250 unaku 1000 roba katti irukaren naan GST yoda.
Executive: Aama sir neenga pay pannathu poga rendu maasathukana kalichittu.
Customer: Ippo rendu maasam iruntha evlo sir pogum approximately.
Executive: Approximately athu kanaku athu accounts team thaan enna solrathu athu athu process pannumbothu ungaluku evlo varuthu ntrathu naan eduthu avungaluku share panni solren sollunga.
Customer: Seri sir ippo monthly pathinga ippo yearly pack vanthu 32 something ethu solli irunthanga.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: GST yoda 37700 solli irunthanga.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Abdi namma maasam kanaku panna pathinga 3200 thaan abdi varuthu monthly.
Customer: Rendu maasam pathinga 6400 6400 abdi something varuthu athu vanthu kami pannittu neenga kudippinga nu neenga solreengala.
Executive: Aamaanga sir aamaanga sir.
Customer: Naan GST yoda pay panni irukena.
Executive: GST yoda serthu thaan sir solren.
Customer: Ithu evlo naal aagum sir ithu process enaku ippo naan vanthu.
Executive: Maximum one week kulla ungaluku receive aayidum sir.
Customer: One week kullaingala.
Executive: Aama sir.
Customer: Eppadi account la refund panreengala illa mail la varanuma naan neenga UPI la panni irukinga illaiya online la UPI la panni irukinga.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: UPI laiye ungaluku receive aayidum amount.
Customer: Okay la.
Executive: Enna mode of payment la pannigalo athuliye ungaluku receive aayidum.
Customer: Seri purinjiruchu intha week kulla panna paaringa sir ella neethu naan mail potten saturday munnadi paakalaama illa eppo paakalaam.
Executive: So ungaluku once receive aanathuku appuram ungaluku maila vanthurum amount receive aanathuku appuram maila varum so neenga atha mattum check pannunga seri la ungaluku maximum process pannitaanga innum onnu rendu moonu approval mattum pending athu mudinjichina ungaluku amount vanthurum konjam maximum naan solrathu one week athukulle vanthurum.
Customer: Seri sir unga ethu ungaluku personal contact pannuma ethu number irukka sir unga kitta yaachu pesurathuku.
Executive: Sujitha sujitha ve neenga contact pannalaam sir neenga sujitha avunga ennaiku avunga actually leave innaiku avunga actually leave ngrathunala thaan ungaluku maybe avunga answer panni irukka maataanga avunga ethu oru health issue irukku ngrathunala dental health ethu poru poi irukanga so she will come tomorrow sir naalaki vanthuruvaanga neenga naalaki call panninga abdinna kandippa avunga eduppaanga.
Customer: Neenga yaaru sir neenga.
Executive: Naan sujitha vuda manager thaan sir.
Customer: Neenga pesurathu call la message potrukingale.
Executive: Aama naan thaan enaku enaku aama enaku vanthu phone vanthu switch off la irunthathu en phone switch off la irunthathu enodi whatsapp la ungaludiya ethu vanthu call vanthathu ngrathu enaku kaamiichu irunthathu neenga whatsapp call um panni irunthinga illaiya appo naan oru meeting la iruntha.
Executive: Athuku appuram thaan naan ungaluku call pannumnu ninaikkumbothu neenga ippo 9696 call pannitinga athu appadiye enaku connect aayiruchu.
Customer: Seri sir naan marupadiyum.
Executive: Ithu vanthu systematic number ngrathunala enodi personal number me map aayirukku athunala en personal number thaan enaku tag aagi vanthurum.
Customer: Seri seri ippo eppadi sir intha 9696 ku call pannuva naan naalaki marupadiyum.
Executive: Illa illa naan ippo ungaluku text panni iruppen naan ungaludiya neenga hi potrukinga illaiya morning hi sir nu solli text potrukinga illaiya antha number naan check pannen unga number thaan 72004350034 intha number irukku illaiya intha number ku naane message podren hi nu ippo potruken so intha number ke neenga call pannunga athavathu kadasiya 56 end aagum intha number thaan enodiya number neenga intha number ke message call um podunga naane call panren.
Customer: Ippo 2 or 3 days ethu idhaaguma sir late aaguma.
Executive: Sir maximum naan solrathu one week athukulle ungaluku vanthurum.
Customer: Seri paappom sir.
Executive: Okay okay thank you sir thank you.
Customer: Sir hello sir oru second sir kekuthungala.
Executive: Sollunga sollunga kekuthu kekuthu sir.
Executive: Yes sir so ithuku appuram going forward neenga vanthu intha 96 call panninga abdinna athu poittu anga poittu enaku tag aagurathuku oru ippo paathingale namma connect panrathuku evlo neram iruthathu nu solli so intha maari konjam time irukum naan enna panren abdinna ennodaiya number kuduthu irukken illaiya 560056 nu solli intha number ke neenga call pannunga and ippo namma vanthu through 9696 call pannathunala kekuthungala.
Customer: Kekuthu sir ippo naan switch off la irunthinga naan 9696 call pannen.
Executive: Seri seri athu no issues no issues so ithuku appuram going forward neenga call pannumna neenga text podunga illa calle pannunga naalaki kuda call pannunga no issues en personal number irunthu kuda naan call panren problem kidaiyathu athunala like ithuku appuram going forward neenga enake direct ave call pannunga enna ithu suthi ungaluku vanthu call varum athunala thaan and ippo namma vanthu intha 9696 mooliyama connect pannumnu ngrathunala ungaluku oru feedback varum mail la namma eppadi pesi irukkom abdingrathu correct aana ithu thaan pesi irukoma abdingrathukana ithu ellame mail la varum antha feedback mattum konjam paaringa seri la.
Customer: Paathukuren sir konjam paathu konjam seekirama mudichi vidunga sir.
Executive: Seri seri seri maximum one week athukulle ungaluku vanthurum athu ellam neenga ethu kavalai pada vendaam.
Customer: Okay sir thank you sir.
Executive: Thank you sir okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants refund for subscription amount.

- Customer is not receiving payments from buyers.

- Manager's number is switched off.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed refund process initiated.

- Executive assured refund within one week.

- Executive shared personal number for direct contact.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact executive on personal number.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, payment, subscription, buyleads
